listeningQuestion.question: Why did the police have to push Jumbo off the main street?
listeningQuestion.translation: 为什么警察不得不把江伯推离主要街道？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个有趣的圣诞节故事。马戏团老板吉米·盖茨为了给儿童医院送礼物，打扮成圣诞老人，骑着小象江伯在城市主要街道上巡游，结果阻碍了交通。尽管吉米同意立即离开，但江伯拒绝移动，最终需要15名警察合力将其推离街道。文章通过这个幽默的故事，展示了情态动词的多种用法，包括should have done（原本应该做而没做）、ought to have done（应该做而没做）等，以及多个与交通和警察相关的词汇和短语。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
notes: Last Christmas, the circus owner, Jimmy Gates, decided to take some presents to a children's hospital.
Dressed up as Father Christmas and accompanied by a 'guard of honour' of six pretty girls, he set off down the main street of the city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo.
He should have known that the police would never allow this sort of thing.
A policeman approached Jimmy and told him he ought to have gone along a side street as Jumbo was holding up the traffic.
Though Jimmy agreed to go at once, Jumbo refused to move.
Fifteen policemen had to push very hard to get him off the main street.
The police had a difficult time, but they were most amused.
'Jumbo must weigh a few tons,' said a policeman afterwards, 'so it was fortunate that we didn't have to carry him.
Of course, we should arrest him, but as he has a good record, we shall let him off this time.'

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 去年圣诞节, 马戏团老板吉米·盖茨决定送些礼物给儿童医院.
他打扮成圣诞老人, 在由6个漂亮姑娘组成的'仪仗队'的陪同下, 骑上一头名叫江伯的小象, 沿着城里的主要街道出发了.
他本该知道警察绝不会允许这类事情发生.
一个警察走过来告诉吉米, 他应该走一条小路, 因为江伯阻碍了交通.
虽然吉米同意马上就走, 但江伯却拒绝移动.
15个警察不得不用很大的力气把它推离主要街道.
警察虽然吃了苦头, 但他们还是感到很有趣.
'江伯一定有好几吨重,'一个警察事后这样说, '值得庆幸的是它没让我们抬它走.
当然, 我们应该逮捕它, 但由于它一贯表现很好, 这次我们饶了它.'

notes.title: 情态动词+have done
content: 情态动词+have done表示对过去事情的推测或评价。
should have done：原本应该发生而没发生
例如：He should have known that the police would never allow this sort of thing.（他本该知道警察绝不会允许这类事情发生。）
ought to have done：也表示原本应该做而没做
例如：A policeman approached Jimmy and told him he ought to have gone along a side street.（一个警察走过来告诉吉米，他应该走一条小路。）
needn't have done：过去不必做但是做了
例如：You needn't have bought so much food.（你没必要买这么多食物。）

notes.title: dress up as的用法
content: dress up as...表示'装扮成...（的样子）'。

例如：Dressed up as Father Christmas and accompanied by a 'guard of honour' of six pretty girls, he set off down the main street of the city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo.（他打扮成圣诞老人，在由6个漂亮姑娘组成的'仪仗队'的陪同下，骑上一头名叫江伯的小象，沿着城里的主要街道出发了。）
dress up单独使用表示'打扮'，强调精心打扮。
dress表示'穿衣，打扮'，可以是及物动词或不及物动词。
例如：Tom has nearly learned how to dress/dress himself now.（汤姆现在几乎学会了如何穿衣。）

notes.title: agree的用法
content: agree to do sth.：同意做某事（to为不定式）
例如：Though Jimmy agreed to go at once, Jumbo refused to move.（虽然吉米同意马上就走，但江伯却拒绝移动。）
agree with sb.：同意某人（的建议等）
例如：I agree with you.（我同意你的观点。）
agree to sth.：同意某事
例如：I agree to your advice.（我同意你的建议。）
agree和accept的区别：agree表示'同意'，常与to和with连用；accept表示'接受，收受'。

notes.title: let的短语
content: let sb. in：允许进来
例如：The woman who let me in had a baby in her arms.（让我进来的那个女人怀里抱着一个婴儿。）
let sb. out：放走，释放，放出去
例如：Every evening they let the dog out.（每天晚上他们都把狗放出去。）
let off：放过，饶过，宽恕，对...从轻处理
例如：Of course, we should arrest him, but as he has a good record, we shall let him off this time.（当然，我们应该逮捕它，但由于它一贯表现很好，这次我们饶了它。）
let down：使...失望，（在紧要关头）抛弃
例如：They need your help. Don't let them down.（他们需要你的帮助。别让他们失望。）

notes.context: 表示装扮成某人的样子
notes.example: Dressed up as Father Christmas and accompanied by a 'guard of honour' of six pretty girls, he set off down the main street of the city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo.

notes.context: 表示开始一段旅程或行动
notes.example: He set off down the main street of the city riding a baby elephant called Jumbo.
A policeman approached Jimmy and told him he ought to have gone along a side street as Jumbo was holding up the traffic.

notes.context: 表示从某处移开或除去某物
notes.example: Fifteen policemen had to push very hard to get him off the main street.

notes.translation: 饶恕某人，放过...，对...从轻处理
notes.context: 表示饶恕或从轻处理某人
notes.example: Of course, we should arrest him, but as he has a good record, we shall let him off this time.

multipleChoice.question: Jimmy ___ Father Christmas.
multipleChoice.explanation: look like后面加代词或名词，表示'像...一样'。seem后面可以直接加形容词，或加to不定式结构，或加that从句，或加as if从句。

multipleChoice.question: He should have known the police wouldn't allow it ___.
multipleChoice.explanation: should have done表示'原本应该做而没做'，所以用but he didn't表示他没做这个事实。

multipleChoice.question: ___ to carry him?
multipleChoice.explanation: have to中的have是实义动词，所以用Did they have。must后面不会加to。

fillInBlanks.sentence: He ___ have known that the police would never allow this sort of thing.
fillInBlanks.explanation: should have done表示'原本应该做而没做'。

fillInBlanks.sentence: A policeman approached Jimmy and told him he ___ have gone along a side street.
fillInBlanks.explanation: ought to have done也表示'原本应该做而没做'。

notes.title: 词汇辨析
notes.content:
1. Versus的用法：
- versus = against，表示'对，对抗'的概念
- vs.是versus的缩写，读音不变
- 例如：Have you watched the game last night? It was France versus Italy.（你看昨晚的比赛了吗？是法国对意大利。）

2. Approach的用法：
- v. 走近（= come nearer and nearer）
- 例如：The old man approaches 80 years old.（这位老人接近80岁了。）
- approach sb.：离某人越来越近
- 例如：He is approaching me.（他正在向我走来。）
- n. 途径，方法
- 例如：We have found an approach to success.（我们找到了成功的途径。）

3. Weigh的用法：
- sb./sth. weigh +体重：...的体重/重量是...
- weight n. 重量
- lose weight：减肥

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 圣诞节（Christmas）是西方最重要的节日之一，通常在12月25日庆祝。圣诞老人（Father Christmas或Santa Claus）是圣诞节的象征，他会在平安夜（Christmas Eve）给孩子们送礼物。在英语国家，圣诞节期间会有各种庆祝活动，包括装饰圣诞树、交换礼物、唱圣诞颂歌等。本文中的马戏团老板吉米·盖茨为了给儿童医院送礼物，打扮成圣诞老人，骑着小象在城市街道上巡游，这种创意活动在西方国家并不罕见，体现了人们乐于分享和帮助他人的精神。然而，这种活动也需要遵守交通规则，不能影响公共秩序。
